name: Mickey Mouse
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.1 (beta) Details Title Mickey Mouse Model No. DC-95 Manufacturer Nintendo Series Game & Watch (Panorama Screen) Release Date February 28, 1984 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

In this 1984 Panorama Screen edition in Nintendo's Game & Watch series Mickey Mouse has to perform baton acrobatics while balancing on a ball in a circus.

Gameplay

Move Mickey Mouse left and right to keep all the batons in the air while balancing on a ball. He will automatically toss up any baton he catches. But avoid the flaming torches that occasionally fall between the batons. Dropping a baton or accidentally catching a flaming torch will result in a miss. Three misses and the game ends.

Controls Keyboard Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio Luca Antignano ( madrgialdesign.it ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
